scripts.build: rm -rf dist && node ./node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc && rm -rf ./examples/lib && mkdir -p ./examples/lib && cp -R dist ./examples/lib && cp -R typings ./examples/lib && cp index.js ./examples/lib && cp index.d.ts ./examples/lib && cp package.json ./examples/lib
scripts.copy: mkdir -p ./examples/lib && cp -R dist ./lib && cp index.js ./examples/lib && cp index.d.ts ./examples/lib && cp package.json ./examples/lib
